name: UIkit
title: getuikit.com
shortDescription: UIkit is a modular front-end framework designed for web developers to create lightweight, fast, and powerful web interfaces. It is ideal for developers looking to streamline their web development process with a framework that offers extensive customization options through Less, Sass, and JavaScript. An example use case could be a developer building a responsive and interactive website for a startup.
pros: Extensive customization with Less and Sass
Rich set of components for interface development
cons: Requires knowledge of Less or Sass for full customization
Might be less known compared to other frameworks like Bootstrap
Limited built-in themes compared to competitors

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Bulma
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Modern CSS framework with no JS
